attributes.action: make a public statement to let the taxpayer know just how many standard rate taxpayers contributions are negated every time somebody in the civil service and/or government retires early and goes with a huge severence payment and enormous gold plated pension entitlements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has to come a time when there is just no point in anybody working anymore because all the taxes they pay will merely be paid out directly to a former government minister or Whitehall mandarin who had to 'leave early' because he/she failed to do his/her job properly.
